data.title: Jeremy Sisto Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Jeremy Sisto with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

His middle name, Merton, comes from the philosopher Thomas Merton

Grew up in Chicago and started acting at the age of 8 with his sister

They made their stage debut in a production of Tennessee Williams' House Not Meant to Stand

Appeared as a young boy in the music video for Twisted Sister's "We're Not Gonna Take It

" Made his film debut in 1991 playing Kevin Kline's son in Grand Canyon

Hobbies include playing the guitar and Bocci (Italian bowling)
